Variables
SharpNeat.​Graphs
namespace SharpNeat.Graphs
DirectedGraphBuilder
public static
DirectedGraphBuilder

Static class for building instances of DirectedGraph.

Functions
Create
public static DirectedGraph Create(
Span<DirectedConnection> connections,
int inputCount,
int outputCount
)

Create a directed graph based on the provided connections (between node IDs) and a predefined set of input/output node IDs defined as being in a contiguous sequence starting at ID zero.

connections is required to be sorted by sourceId, TargetId.

Parameters
connections
Span<DirectedConnection>

The connections that define the structure and weights of the weighted directed graph.

inputCount
int

Input node count.

outputCount
int

Output node count.

Returns

A new instance of DirectedGraph.
